hero.title: Bringing Your Ideas to
hero.description: I help businesses and individuals build powerful digital solutions that actually work. Whether you need a sleek website, smart automation, or a complete web app—let's make it happen together.

about.subtitle: About Me
about.title: Nice to
about.intro: Hey! I'm Fatima Zahra Sabbar, a Full Stack Developer and IT specialist who loves turning complicated problems into simple, effective digital solutions.
about.description: I've been building websites and apps for over 3 years now, and honestly? I still get excited about every new project. My sweet spot is creating stuff that's not just pretty to look at, but actually makes life easier for the people using it. From sleek user interfaces to solid backend systems and smart automation—I handle it all. For me, it's not just about writing code; it's about creating something that really moves the needle for your business.

fullstack.title: Full Stack Development
fullstack.description: I build complete web solutions using modern tech like React, Next.js, and Node.js. Fast, scalable, and built to last.

ai.title: AI & Automation
ai.description: Let's face it—nobody likes repetitive tasks. I use AI and custom automation to handle the boring stuff, so you can focus on what matters.

wordpress.title: WordPress & CMS
wordpress.description: Need a WordPress site? I create custom themes and plugins that match your brand perfectly and are easy for you to manage.

it.title: IT Consulting
it.description: Sometimes you just need someone who gets it. I help businesses set up secure, scalable tech infrastructure that actually makes sense.

frontend.title: Frontend
frontend.description: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React, Next.js, Bootstrap

webdev.title: Website & Web App Development
webdev.description: I build responsive, fast-loading websites and web apps that work beautifully on any device.

automation.title: IT & Automation Solutions
automation.description: Custom scripts and AI-powered workflows that handle repetitive tasks automatically—because your time is valuable.

uiux.title: UI/UX Design
uiux.description: Clean, modern interfaces that people actually enjoy using. Good design isn't just about looking good—it's about working well.

mobile.title: Mobile App Development
mobile.description: Cross-platform mobile apps that give your users a smooth experience on both iOS and Android.

seo.title: SEO & Digital Marketing
seo.description: Getting your site to rank higher in search results, so the right people can actually find you online.

cloud.title: Cloud Solutions
cloud.description: Secure, scalable cloud infrastructure that grows with your business and keeps your data safe.

contact.subtitle: Get in Touch
contact.title: Let's
contact.formDescription: Got a project in mind? Just want to chat about an idea? Drop me a message—I'd love to hear from you!

footer.tagline: Turning ideas into reality, one line of code at a time.

blog.subtitle: Latest Posts
blog.title: From the
blog.description: Thoughts on web development, tech trends, and practical tips I've learned along the way.

whyChooseMe.subtitle: Why Me?
whyChooseMe.title: What Makes Me
whyChooseMe.description: Look, there are plenty of developers out there. But here's what you get when we work together: someone who genuinely cares about your project's success and treats it like it's my own.

innovative.title: Fresh Perspectives
innovative.description: I don't do cookie-cutter solutions. Every project gets my full creative attention to build something that stands out and actually works for you.

reliable.title: On Time, Every Time
reliable.description: Your time matters. I stick to deadlines, keep you in the loop, and deliver quality work when I say I will.

excellence.title: Quality Over Everything
excellence.description: I'm a bit of a perfectionist (in a good way). Using the latest tech and best practices, I build things that last and perform well.

partnership.title: In It for the Long Haul
partnership.description: Launch day isn't goodbye. I stick around to make sure everything runs smoothly and help you grow over time.
